definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: There emerged 36 kinds of intonation patterns of sound cluster of double characters group in Qishan dialect.
sentences.chinese: 岐山方言語音中兩字組連讀共產生了36種連讀調式。

sentences.english: The formation of separable two-character word group also suffers from the role of analogy.
sentences.chinese: 漢語離合二字組的產生同時受着類推作用的影響。

sentences.english: The tone sandhi of disyllabic word and the neutral tone.
sentences.chinese: 描寫莒南方言兩字組連讀變調及輕聲的變調。

sentences.english: Selects 21 groups of two-syllabic as the basic investigation model.
sentences.chinese: 選取21組二字組爲基本調查模型。

sentences.english: Distinguishing between regular morpheme sequences and irregular morpheme sequences is the foundation of language acquisition.
sentences.chinese: 區分規則字組和不規則字組是語言習得的基礎。

sentences.english: Distinguishing between regular morpheme sequences and irregular morpheme sequences is the foundation of language acquisition.
sentences.chinese: 區分規則字組和不規則字組是語言習得的基礎。

sentences.english: There are few words in the law more beautiful than settlement.
sentences.chinese: 法律上的一些字組比自行和解一詞更美麗。

sentences.english: The two-character word group meets both the needs of Chinese expression and characters'rhythm.
sentences.chinese: 現代漢語中，二字組取代單字成爲漢語的主要結構。

sentences.english: This is another cause of separable two-character word group.
sentences.chinese: 這是離合二字組的又一成因。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 presents the experimental results of the neutral tone in disyllabic sequences.
sentences.chinese: 第四章爲兩字組輕聲的實驗結果。

definition: combined ideogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/Chinese character that combines the meanings of existing elements/also known as joint ideogram or associative compounds
lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
phonetic component of a Chinese character
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
